title: Heart of Static
description: You have located the true 'Harbinger' mass deep within the bedrock. It is a terrifying amalgamation of ancient supercomputers fused perfectly with Scourge bio-matter.

turns.narrative: The Harbinger is a city-block-sized brain suspended by carbon-fiber cables. It speaks directly into your mind via extreme static noise.
turns.choice_a: Resist the psychic intrusion with sheer willpower
turns.consequence_a: You brace yourself. You succeed, avoiding massive psychic damage, but slow your attacks.
turns.choice_b: Embrace the static to understand its weakness
turns.consequence_b: You take extreme psychic damage, but learn that severing the server cables will cripple its processing power.

turns.narrative: The Harbinger summons avatars of your previously defeated foes, built from static and flesh. They rush you simultaneously.
turns.consequence_a: You clear the clones, but damage the cavern supports. The room begins to collapse.
turns.choice_b: Duel them individually using precise strikes
turns.consequence_b: You spend enormous stamina but clear them cleanly, keeping the cavern stable.

turns.narrative: The core is exposed. You dive in for the killing blow.
turns.choice_a: Drive your weapon into its biological brain
turns.consequence_a: The Harbinger shrieks as its organic half dies, but the machine half attempts a desperate final upload.
turns.choice_b: Smash the quantum processors at its base
turns.consequence_b: The machine dies permanently, but the massive brain continues to spasm and leak toxins.

brain_killed.description: You destroyed its organic core. The machine survived briefly but was neutralized.

processor_smashed.description: You smashed its quantum processors. The organic mass is left rotting.

conclusion: You destroyed its organic core. The machine survived briefly but was neutralized.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
